name: Pizza Pete Adventures
description:
Adventures of Pizza Pete

Dodge hazards shoot enemies and watch your stamina

Regain stamina by collecting coins defeating bosses 

Regain stamina also with fuel tanks 

Controls 

Arrows to Move

Z is to shoot

C shoots (the boss power ups only)

                                                          Disclaimer 

C is to shoot(only after you kill a boss you can unlock the power which allows you to shoot with C

Powers ups only last for about 30 secs 

you can also hold down the Z and C you can shoot the normal projectiles as well as the boss power ups
